attributes.action: provide a voucher scheme for free school meals to children with parents on a low income throughout the school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Throughout the school year parents that are on a low income or certain benefits are eligible for their children to receive free school meals, but this does not apply throughout the long school holidays when parents on the low income/benefits find that the cost of having the extra meals a very expensive time, i would like to see a voucher scheme come into force where these families would benefit hugely from this system, similar to the Healthy meal voucher scheme.
